Pre-Game Insights: Cameroon are aiming for nothing less than three points when facing off against Guinea on Monday, 15 January in their opening Group C match.
The Indomitable Lions of Cameroon are in search of their sixth continental crown, having last won it in 2017 under coach Hugo Broos.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cote d'Ivoire is where Cameroon won their first ever TotalEnergies CAF AFCON title back in 1984 with a 3-1 win over Nigeria.
The Cameroonians are set for an exciting tournament in Cote d'Ivoire.
The 17h00 kick off promises to be an action packed affair in Yamoussoukro.
Others: Cameroon will be hoping the host nation brings a lucky charm to their search of an elusive sixth title.
Guinea fell shy of being crowned champions in 1976 where they narrowly edged by Morocco in the final.
In the 2021 edition, they reached the quarter-finals of the competition, proving that they are certainly no pushovers and are eager to make a name for themselves on the continent.
